verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Command <S%H6680><s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that they <S%H3947>bring<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thee <S%H2134>pure<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> <S%H2132>olive<s%> <S%H3795>beaten<s%> for the <S%H3974>light,<s%> to cause the <S%H5216>lamps<s%> to <S%H5927>burn<s%> <S%H8548>continually.<s%>

Without <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2351><s%> the <S%H6532>veil<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony,<s%> in the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%> shall <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H6186>order<s%> it from the <S%H4480>evening<s%> <S%H6153><s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H1242>morning<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H8548>continually:<s%> it shall be a <S%H2708>statute<s%> <S%H5769>forever<s%> in your <S%H1755>generations.<s%>
He shall <S%H6186>order<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5216>lamps<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H4501>candlestick<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H8548>continually.<s%>

And thou shalt <S%H3947>take<s%> fine <S%H5560>flour,<s%> and <S%H644>bake<s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H2471>cakes<s%> thereof: <S%H8147>two<s%> tenth <S%H6241>deals<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H2471>cake.<s%>

And thou shalt <S%H7760>set<s%> them in <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4634>rows,<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> on a <S%H4635>row,<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H7979>table<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And thou shalt <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H2134>pure<s%> <S%H3828>frankincense<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> each <S%H4635>row,<s%> that it may <S%H1961>be<s%> on the <S%H3899>bread<s%> for a <S%H234>memorial,<s%> even an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Every <S%H3117>sabbath<s%> <S%H7676><s%> <S%H3117><s%> <S%H7676><s%> he shall set it in <S%H6186>order<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H8548>continually,<s%> being taken <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H854><s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> by an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H1285>covenant.<s%>

And it shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H175>Aaron's<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons';<s%> and they shall <S%H398>eat<s%> it in the <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H4725>place:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> is most <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H6944><s%> unto him of the offerings of the LORD made by <S%H4480>fire<s%> <S%H801><s%> <S%H3068><s%> by a <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H2706>statute.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>son<s%> of an <S%H3482>Israelitish<s%> <S%H802>woman,<s%> <S%H1931>whose<s%> <S%H1121>father<s%> <S%H376><s%> was an <S%H4713>Egyptian,<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> and this <S%H1121>son<s%> of the <S%H3482>Israelitish<s%> woman and a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H3481>Israel<s%> strove <S%H5327>together<s%> in the <S%H4264>camp;<s%>

And the <S%H3482>Israelitish<s%> <S%H802>woman's<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H5344>blasphemed<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the LORD, and <S%H7043>cursed.<s%> And they <S%H935>brought<s%> him <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses:<s%> (and his <S%H517>mother's<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H8019>Shelomith,<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H1704>Dibri,<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of Dan: <S%H1835>)<s%>
And they <S%H5117>put<s%> him in <S%H4929>ward,<s%> <S%H5921>that<s%> the <S%H6310>mind<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> might be <S%H6567>showed<s%> them.
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Bring <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H853><s%> him that hath <S%H7043>cursed<s%> <S%H413>without<s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2351><s%> the <S%H4264>camp;<s%> and let <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H8085>heard<s%> him <S%H5564>lay<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H3027>hands<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> his <S%H7218>head,<s%> and let <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> <S%H7275>stone<s%> him.

And thou shalt <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H376>Whosoever<s%> <S%H376><s%> <S%H3588><s%> <S%H7043>curseth<s%> his <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> his <S%H2399>sin.<s%>

And he that <S%H5344>blasphemeth<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> he shall surely be put to <S%H4191>death,<s%> <S%H4191><s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> shall certainly <S%H7275>stone<s%> <S%H7275><s%> him: as well the <S%H1616>stranger,<s%> as he that is born in the <S%H249>land,<s%> when he <S%H5344>blasphemeth<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the LORD, shall be put to <S%H4191>death.<s%>
And <S%H376>he<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H5221>killeth<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H5315>man<s%> <S%H120><s%> shall surely be put to <S%H4191>death.<s%> <S%H4191><s%>
And he that <S%H5221>killeth<s%> a <S%H5315>beast<s%> <S%H929><s%> shall make it <S%H7999>good;<s%> <S%H5315>beast<s%> <S%H8478>for<s%> <S%H5315>beast.<s%>

And <S%H3588>if<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H5414>cause<s%> a <S%H3971>blemish<s%> in his <S%H5997>neighbor;<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> he hath <S%H6213>done,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> shall it be <S%H6213>done<s%> to him;

Breach <S%H7667><s%> <S%H8478>for<s%> <S%H7667>breach,<s%> <S%H5869>eye<s%> <S%H8478>for<s%> <S%H5869>eye,<s%> <S%H8127>tooth<s%> <S%H8478>for<s%> <S%H8127>tooth:<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> he hath <S%H5414>caused<s%> a <S%H3971>blemish<s%> in a <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> shall it be <S%H5414>done<s%> to him again.
And he that <S%H5221>killeth<s%> a <S%H929>beast,<s%> he shall <S%H7999>restore<s%> it: and he that <S%H5221>killeth<s%> a <S%H120>man,<s%> he shall be put to <S%H4191>death.<s%>

Ye shall <S%H1961>have<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> manner of <S%H4941>law,<s%> as <S%H1961>well<s%> for the <S%H1616>stranger,<s%> as for one of your own <S%H249>country:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that they should bring <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H853><s%> him that had <S%H7043>cursed<s%> out <S%H413>of<s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2351><s%> the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> and <S%H7275>stone<s%> him with <S%H68>stones.<s%> And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>
